body.name: Computer PC Speakers USB Powered 3.5mm AUX Jack Volume Control Ice-Blue LED Light HiFi Stereo Sound Quality Mini Gaming Desktop Monitors Laptops Speakers for Windows PC Ipad Smartphone Tablet MP3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 26 mins
features: 【Light up your space with our LED-lit computer speakers】Upgrade your computer setup with our sleek and stylish LED-lit computer speakers. The mesmerizing ice blue LED light not only adds a touch of sophistication to your space but also creates a soothing and relaxing ambiance. Connect them easily to your computer or laptop using the USB power and 3.5mm audio cable for a visually appealing setup.

【Enjoy Eco-Friendly and Safe Listening with our Environmentally Conscious Design】MARBOO USB powered PC speakers are crafted with environmentally friendly materials that are free from harmful pollutants. With their clean and safe design, you can enjoy your music with peace of mind.

【Well-designed sealed chamber immerses you in the sea of music】Our USB powered PC gaming desktop speakers are 35% more airtight than those on the market.. With their exceptional penetration and crystal clear audio, you'll be able to enjoy your favorite content like never before.

【Bring your Music Anywhere with our Portable 3.5mm AUX Computer Speakers】Experience high-quality sound on the go with our portable USB powered computer speakers. Their compact size and USB power supply make them perfect for taking with you wherever you go. Connect them to your laptop, smartphone, or any other device using the 3.5mm audio cable for a versatile and convenient audio experience.

【Easy to use】Connect to your computer or laptop with USB power and a 3.5mm audio cable for easy setup and convenience. No need for complicated setups and confusing wires, just plug in the power and audio cables and enjoy high quality sound.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 15 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars larger than the pics make them appear. Big value for the price. Look high quality
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised to find they are actually a good size and larger than they appear in the pictures.The sound was great for an inexpensive speaker set.With the blue LED and silver hubs they look sort of high end and good quality.Im very impressed with what I got for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sound is good, great item for such a low price. Using for monitor used as TV and does its job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More Bass than anything else
reviews.reviewText: For the price, they aren't bad at all. I have them sitting under my monitor. Anyone who says that the LED's are too bright must have their monitor brightness turned way down.The Bass is pretty strong for 2" speakers, but the high tones are somewhat overshadowed by the bass. They put out good volume though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: At first, I didn't like the speakers because of the bright lights and thought that I couldn't turn them off because of other reviews. Fortunately, there is a small switch on the volume adjuster that turns it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Las 3 B: Buenos, bonitos y baratos
reviews.reviewText: Casi siempre consideramos que lo barato sale caro pero este no fue el caso. Claro no puedo decir que son iguales a unos gama alta pero no tienen mucho que envidiarles. Tienen buen sonido, las luz led se puede apagar, son pequeños y tienen un diseño atractivo y para mi lo mejor es el precio, realmente económicos para la calidad de construcción y sonido.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I like to listen to audiobooks when I am working remotely, and these have some of the best sound that I have found! I absolutely love the color too. Makes my desk look stunning and more put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The sound is barely louder than my laptop internal speaker. It's fiddly bc it needs 2 cords (usb for power & headphone jack to connect to device/ laptop). The benefit is you can place the speakers closer to the person hearing the sound, so still useful, but it's not a significant increase in volume- it just moves the volume closer to you. And they're very cute & fun, as the kids pointed out.
